name: Light Helmet
special: Reduce any _Stun_ received from non-_Mental_ Attacks by 1.

name: Heavy Helmet
special: Reduce any _Stun_ received from non-_Mental_ Attacks by 2.

name: Gambeson
special: Whenever this Armor loses _Durability_, reduce the _Resistance_ it provides by 1.

name: Chain Shirt
special: Whenever this Armor loses _Durability_, reduce a _Resistance_ it provides by 1 (attacker's choice).

name: Chainmail
special: Whenever this Armor loses _Durability_, reduce a _Resistance_ it provides by 1 (attacker's choice).

name: Half Plating
special: Whenever this Armor loses _Durability_, reduce the _Guard_ it provides by 1.

name: Full Plate
special: Whenever this Armor loses _Durability_, reduce the _Guard_ it provides by 1.
